p: Clinics also need to plan for the ‘new normal’ that will present itself as the effects of the pandemic slowly subside. It appears to be easier to close things down than to restart them and clinics will have to retain and restore their services in a very difficult economic environment. The context of CLE will be different on ‘the other side of the pandemic’. Some things will have changed forever while there will also be new practices that clinics can and should hold onto as they develop the ‘new normal’.
